sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAVREE a town of Hindustan, in the Western Ghauts, and province of Bejapoor. It was the first stronghold seized by Sevajee, the great founder of the Mahratta power. It is forty-five miles south-south-west from Poonah. Long. 73. 32. E. Lat. 18. 2. N.
